description: MainActivity.kt defines the core Android activity for a music player app, including UI initialization, event handling, volume and seek controls, and utility functions for formatting time and building display messages.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Android activity managing the music player UI, including playback controls, seekbar, volume, and display of track info.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, binds event handlers, and sets up controls for the music player.

methods.name: buildMessage
methods.description: Constructs a formatted message string combining split tokens and capitalization, used for displaying artist info.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Converts seconds into a M:SS time string for display.
